title: 旧约 - 以赛亚书(Isaiah) - 第 12 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 以赛亚书(Isaiah) -- 第 12 章 ( 本篇共有 66 章 )

lineList.en: And in that day thou shalt say, O LORD, I will praise thee: though thou wast angry with me, thine anger is turned away, and thou comfortedst me.
lineList.cn: 到那日，你必说，耶和华阿，我要称谢你因为你虽然向我发怒，你的怒气却已转消，你又安慰了我。

lineList.en: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the LORD JEHOVAH is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
lineList.cn: 看哪，神是我的拯救。我要倚靠他，并不惧怕。因为主耶和华是我的力量，是我的诗歌。他也成为我的拯救。

lineList.en: Therefore with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
lineList.cn: 所以你们必从救恩的泉源欢然取水。

lineList.en: And in that day shall ye say, Praise the LORD, call upon his name, declare his doings among the people, make mention that his name is exalted.
lineList.cn: 在那日，你们要说，当称谢耶和华，求告他的名，将他所行的传扬在万民中，题说他的名已被尊崇。

lineList.en: Sing unto the LORD; for he hath done excellent things: this is known in all the earth.
lineList.cn: 你们要向耶和华唱歌。因他所行的甚是美好。但愿这事普传天下。

lineList.en: Cry out and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion: for great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.
lineList.cn: 锡安的居民哪，当扬声欢呼。因为在你们中间的以色列圣者，乃为至大。
